headline: Several People Shot, Explosives Found in Brooklyn Subway Station: FDNY
author: Jack Phillips
sentences: The picture in the article seems to show and Asian male shot, blacks' violence towards Asians is well noted by Ldotters but they are seldom charged with hate crimes.
I haven't been to that section of Brooklyn in well over a decade, but my Grandparents are buried in Greenwood Cemetery not too far away from this station.
Pretty amazing that there was an actual "Biologist" on the scene, not a career you would anticipate to be highly prevalent in that part of NYC.
Biden will call for more gun control in 3...2...1... Ironically, NYC has some of the strictest gun control laws in the country.
Note 2: "He" had three extended round magazines for a .380, was half way through #2 when it jammed...16 shot.. NONE dead.
Of course, after years of liberal democraps ruling the city just another day in the neighborhood.
There is no reason he was not torn to shreds by people's bare hands except that nobody tried.
It used to be a good working-class neighborhood with relatively low crime too.
When the perp is captured, will they be released without bail?
NONE fought back...even when he was swapping mags to re-load.
Otherwise kneel down and thank your Democrat masters.
Note they did not prevent this.
